function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unequal focus on physical well-being in research","Impact":"Neglect of mental and social well-being in building health","Mitigation":"Encourage more research and literature on mental and social well-being in buildings","Technologies":"Data analysis, surveys, and qualitative research methods","People":"Occupants, building users","Owner":"Research institutions, academic groups, and building professionals"},{"Description":"Professional focus on holistic approach to building health","Impact":"Potential neglect of specific health aspects in building design and maintenance","Mitigation":"Education and training on the importance of considering all aspects of occupant health","Technologies":"Training programs, workshops, and guidelines for building professionals","People":"Building professionals, architects, designers","Owner":"Industry organizations, educational institutions, and government agencies"}]}
